description: 1 iff n is odd square not divisible by 3.
comments: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 1 if 2 divides e and p > 3, 0 otherwise. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 09 2005a(A104777(n)) = 1.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 105, Eq. (41).
formula: Essentially the series psi_6(z)=(1/2)(theta_2(z/9)-theta_2(z)).A080995(n) = a(24n+1).Euler transform of period 144 sequence. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 26 2008a(n) = A033684(n) * A000035(n).Dirichlet g.f. zeta(2*s) *(1-2^(-2s)) *(1-3^(-2s)). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 10 2011
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n%24 == 1, issquare(n), 0)} /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 26 2008 */(Haskell)a033683 n = fromEnum $ odd n && mod n 3 > 0 && a010052 n == 1-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 14 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
